name: Monessen Volunteer Fire Department, Hose House No. 2 Charter Case
name_abbreviation: Monessen Volunteer Fire Department, Hose House No. 2 Charter Case

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Monessen Volunteer Fire Department, Hose House No. 2 Charter Case.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge McWherter; costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert Engel, with him Vincent R. Smith, for appellee.
George II. Frich, City Solicitor, for City of Monessen, intervenor.
casebody.head_matter:
Monessen Volunteer Fire Department, Hose House No. 2 Charter Case.
Argued March 25, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Carroll Caruthers, for appellant.
Robert Engel, with him Vincent R. Smith, for appellee.
George II. Frich, City Solicitor, for City of Monessen, intervenor.
April 14, 1947:
